page.title: 07 Farming(1)
page.content: We interviewed a local farmer about farming life.His working hours are from 6:ooam to 9:oopm in the summer and 6:ooam to 6:30pm in the winter. He was born and brought up on his farm and has worked there all his life.His farm covers 250 acres altogether.He has been a farmer for twenty years and most of his family help him. His wife does the accounts and also looks after the chickens. He says that the farm is "older than the hills"(which means one of the oldest in the area). He keeps lots of different types of animals including cows,sheep,chickens and goats. Most of his land is intensively managed and is used for pasture or for cutting as grass,silage or hay.
